title: New: SKOTT – Porcelain
body:
There’s a Lana Del Rey meets Sia sort of vibe to _Porcelain_, the debut track from **SKOTT**, which features an absolutely stunning vocal and some gloriously over the top production.

Check it out below.

Like this? Follow our [On Repeat Playlist](https://open.spotify.com/user/crackintheroad/playlist/1UB6gJIZpmiO0H2zmSbg02) for a handpicked selection of the very best in new music; updated weekly.
